Posts.Content: Nov 19, 2013 03:34AM camont wrote: Hi to all.... I'm new to this .... discussion boards I have been reading different topics not quite sure where I fit in so ... Here's my story.... mammogram ..... mammogram/ultrasound ...... biopsy's ...... benign tumors .... complex cysts ..... cysts galore ..... swollen lymph nodes under arm..... lumpectomy ..... 6 month club. It all started in 2008..... I was nervous, scared but dealing with it.... then my mother was diagnosed with stage 4 bc....... She went through routine tests mammo's/ultra's/biopsy's..... everything always came back neg.... then MRI deeper biopsy and there it was... in 2011 she passed away...... Well my 1st MRI is coming up and I'm back to being scared.... nervous..... hopeful.... By the way currently 39 a mother of two beautiful children my daughter is 14 and experiencing her 1st cyst in breast.....
Posts.Title: concerned but not diagnosed mommy0608 mommy0608
